name: coco bread
author: African Bites
description: Slightly modified Coco Bread recipe, popular to serve on its own with cheese, or with a nice Jamaican curry.
recipe: Combine and cream &$0, &$1, and &$2 together in a stand mixer with a whisk attachment
Add &$4, &$5, and &$6, and mix with a dough hook for 2-4 minutes until smooth, soft, and uniform
Let dough rest, covered with a tea towel for 2 hours until doubled
Cut dough into 10 equal portions, and roll each portion into a ball
Using a rolling pin, roll each dough ball into a circle, approximately 0.25 inch thick
Transfer to a baking pan and brush each circle with &$7, fold into a semi-circle, and brush again
Bake at 350F for 15 minutes or until golden brown
